items.name: accountId
items.title: Account ID
items.description: Account ID to be associated with the query

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: Label for the NRQL evaluation against the threshold

items.name: threshold
items.title: Threshold
items.description: Numeric value to be compared against the NRQL result. Currently, the NRQL result is evaluated if it's less than or equal to this value
